articles.author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
articles.title: Johannesburg fire: Hijacks and death traps in a crumbling South African city centre - BBC
articles.description: Criminal gangs 'hijack' buildings in South Africa, and then they burn down. And no-one seems able to stop them.
articles.content:
Johannesburg's Central Business District is filled with buildings that look on the brink of collapse. Windows are boarded up and walls are covered in graffiti. 
Streets are filled with detritus - fo… [+5518 chars]
